title: 06/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - NBA injuries, George, Jazz
itunes:title: 06/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - NBA injuries, George, Jazz
description:
Why you shouldn't use injuries as an excuse for not winning in the NBA playoffs

The criticism of Paul George has never been overblown

The Utah Jazz are a much better organization than you think


Guest: Nick Wright

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
